price: Cama ivyamwa vyaco ku gihe Imana yaco Rurema Allah Yagitegekanirije[5]!. Burya Imana Allah, Iha uburorero abantu kugira bibuke, bikebuke.
arabic: تُؤۡتِيٓ أُكُلَهَا كُلَّ حِينِۭ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهَاۗ وَيَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: [5] Ukwemera rero, ni nk’ico giti ciza; gutsimbataye mu mutima, kugashamika ibikorwa bitegetswe n’ingeso nziza zishimisha Imana Allah, ivyo vyose bigaheza bigahemberwa n’Imana Allah ku gihe.

meta.transliteration: tu'tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnin bi-idh'ni rabbihā wayaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla lilnnāsi laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
